data.name: Bear
data.description:
Bear AI helps companies show up AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews. 

We provide analytics to track your brand's visibility, competitive intelligence to understand why competitors rank higher, and ways to improve your content for AI-powered search.
data.one_liner: Show up on AI Search Engines

data.name: Lua Global Inc
data.description:
Lua is putting the power of AI into the hands of SMBs globally.

Lua enables any businesses to launch AI powered sales, support and booking agents in minutes. Our agents seamlessly integrate into a partner’s existing systems and can be distributed across any channel in a couple of clicks (Web, App, Instagram, Messenger, WhatsApp, Email, Voice) - turning every conversation into a unified sales & support experience.

Lua was founded by Lorcan O Cathain (CEO) and Stefan Kruger (CTO)- experienced founders who have spent 15 - 20 years each scaling technology companies across emerging markets.

Lua has active customers in 7 countries and is integrated into some of the world’s largest revenue engines: Shopify, WooCommerce, Ordable, Nuitee, Square and more.

Reach out if you want to talk about how our agents can support in:
- Lowering CAC
- Improving basket conversion rates / ARPU
- Driving automated bookings
- Improving NPS
data.one_liner: Self-Serve AI powered Sales, Support & Booking Agents

data.name: Everest
data.description:
90% of SMBs rely on outsourced IT support companies to manage their IT. It's a $300B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI support engineers to help outsourced IT solve support tickets 20x faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT support companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 140K companies globally.
data.one_liner: We build AI support engineers for outsourced IT services (MSPs)

data.name: Imagine AI
data.description:
Imagine AI is a task-based agentic AI that becomes your company's Head of Content. For B2B service firms, this means turning your partners' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to write posts, our AI performs deep research to build a 100-page persona, captures their authentic voice, and automates content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our college-dropout, second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher). The idea for Imagine AI came after a YC partner told us directly: founders and partners at B2B firms are experts at their jobs, but they consistently struggle to turn that expertise into effective marketing that drives revenue.

We launched just 8 weeks ago and have already reached $14k in revenue from 30 paying users, including forward-thinking firms like Conduit (YC '24). The demand is clear, with a 250+ person waitlist. The results are even clearer: one of our first users recently landed a $5M deal that originated from a single post our AI created.

We are displacing the expensive, low-ROI agency model by building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company. 

To see how we automate your pipeline, book a demo at https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost 

or connect with our CEO, Sky Yang, on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/
data.one_liner: AI agent that handles all of your B2B content needs

data.name: Sunflower
data.description:
Sunflower is on a mission to create one trillion days sober. Our product is both a consumer app (think a "Duolingo for addiction") but also with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 

Consumer App: 
- We built the #1 AI Sponsor for any kind of addiction
- Beautiful visual progression tracking to power the core "task to be done" of addiction
- A twitter style social media for addicts 
- DIY learn content (think Masterclass for addiction) for all major addiction types 
- CBT based journaling exercises 

Tele-Therapy: 
- Think a "Early Medical Peter Attia" quality of clinic, but completely focused on addiction 
- Starting with talk therapy in CA & TX we're rolling out to all 50 states + MAT 
- Bringing together the worlds best doctors to create the most effective protocol for addiction 

Sunflower went from 0 - 100k MAU in less than 6 months, and now we're continuing the traction to create the #1 product for addiction for the 1.2B humans on this planet that struggle with this fundamental human problem.
data.one_liner: A "Duolingo for addiction" with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 🌻
